price: Sendo Alcorão árabe, sem tortuosidade alguma, para serem piedosos.
arabic: قُرۡءَانًا عَرَبِيًّا غَيۡرَ ذِي عِوَجٖ لَّعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qur'ānan ʿarabiyyan ghayra dhī ʿiwajin laʿallahum yattaqūna
